text: @GOPLeader JUST STOP THE BS.  Why not behave like a grown up w/ empathy & deal with the reality that your trump lacked the leadership, selflessness, brains to listen to scientists & deal with Covid-19 properly.  Which in turn would have lessened economic ramifications.  Repubs = disgrace.
